title: Summer Basics Haul: 30 New Arrivals From COS, Levi's, Free People, and More
author: Natalie Gray Herder
excerpt: If your summer wardrobe needs a refresh, shop our editor's curation of denim shorts, basic tops, button-downs, activewear, and so much more.
text: I recently heard Marie Claire editor in chief Nikki Ogunnaike describe the urge to shop as having a case of "the shoppies." Once a month, I get this insatiable desire to purchase an entirely new wardrobe. It's completely irrational (and borderline financially irresponsible), but now I know it has a name. "The shoppies" can only be cured by purchasing something new, and this month's medicine came in the form of perusing my favorite brands (COS, Free People, Adidas, and more) to see what summer wardrobe basics, footwear, and accessories they had in store. I know we're not out here replacing our summer wardrobes entirely, but there's something about purchasing a new item or two that inspires my style. To jazz up a look, go for a beaded necklace, trending sneakers, or lace-trimmed pants. To upgrade your closet staples, shop the new-season jean shorts, linen button-down, and soft white tee below. COS Cropped Striped Cotton Shirt Free People We the Free Palma Board Shorts The ultimate lounge short. Adidas Taekwondo Lace Shoes If it comes in powder blue, I'm buying it. COS Garnet Beaded Necklace I love a chunky beaded necklace for summer. Express Linen-Blend Square Neck Cami This looks so luxe for under $40. Express High Waisted Gauze Lace Hem Pull On Wide Leg Ankle Pant The lace hem is everything to me. Free People Marcie Woven Mary Janes These also come in beige and black. Michael Kors Crochet Straw Bucket Hat A hat you can flatten in your luggage or beach bag is essential. Trust me when I say this is the softest tee on the market. Jenni Kayne Pleated Short For an easy polished look, I'd wear a baggy tee or ribbed tank tucked into these shorts. Gucci Brown Oval Frame Sunglasses These are at the top of my summer wish list. Free People Everyday Linen Shirt Citizens of Humanity Blue Brynn Drawstring Denim Shorts Denim shorts that are actually comfortable. COACH Brooklyn Shoulder Bag 28 The shoulder bag taking NYC by storm. There's something about a red sneaker with an all-white look. A statement ring > a stacking ring. John Hardy Surf Hinged Cuff All the cool fashion people are wearing bangles this season. Levi's Denim Utility Shirt A denim button-down + swimsuit + loose linen shorts = my go-to beach look. Levi's Floral Rodeo Scarf I can't stop tying scarfs around my shoulder bags for added interest. Everyone needs a good pair of white jeans. I'm convinced these are the most lightweight sneakers on the market, which is ideal for summer travel. The North Face Daybreak Rain Jacket The sporty jacket trend isn't slowing down anytime soon. Leset Kyoto Carpenter Pant My go-to pant for summer travel. The North Face Refina Double-Layer Bra New cute activewear alert! The North Face Refina Leggings Go ahead and get the whole set. Lands' End Medium Natural 5 Pocket Open Top Canvas Tote Bag The North Face Evolution Full-Zip Outdoor workout season is loading, and so is my new activewear collection. Lululemon Groove High-Rise Notched-Hem Crop I'd wear these with a baggy tee and pair of flip-flops. This new gray colorway is calling my name.
html:
I recently heard Marie Claire editor in chief Nikki Ogunnaike describe the urge to shop as having a case of "the shoppies." Once a month, I get this insatiable desire to purchase an entirely new wardrobe. It's completely irrational (and borderline financially irresponsible), but now I know it has a name. "The shoppies" can only be cured by purchasing something new, and this month's medicine came in the form of perusing my favorite brands (COS, Free People, Adidas, and more) to see what summer wardrobe basics, footwear, and accessories they had in store. I know we're not out here replacing our summer wardrobes entirely, but there's something about purchasing a new item or two that inspires my style. To jazz up a look, go for a beaded necklace, trending sneakers, or lace-trimmed pants. To upgrade your closet staples, shop the new-season jean shorts, linen button-down, and soft white tee below.

COS

Cropped Striped Cotton Shirt

Free People

We the Free Palma Board Shorts

The ultimate lounge short.

Adidas

Taekwondo Lace Shoes

If it comes in powder blue, I'm buying it.

COS

Garnet Beaded Necklace

I love a chunky beaded necklace for summer.

This looks so luxe for under $40.

Express

The lace hem is everything to me.

Free People

Marcie Woven Mary Janes

These also come in beige and black.

Michael Kors

Crochet Straw Bucket Hat

A hat you can flatten in your luggage or beach bag is essential.

Trust me when I say this is the softest tee on the market.

Jenni Kayne

Pleated Short

For an easy polished look, I'd wear a baggy tee or ribbed tank tucked into these shorts.

Gucci

Brown Oval Frame Sunglasses

These are at the top of my summer wish list.

Free People

Everyday Linen Shirt

Citizens of Humanity

Blue Brynn Drawstring Denim Shorts

Denim shorts that are actually comfortable.

COACH

Brooklyn Shoulder Bag 28

The shoulder bag taking NYC by storm.

There's something about a red sneaker with an all-white look.

A statement ring > a stacking ring.

John Hardy

Surf Hinged Cuff

All the cool fashion people are wearing bangles this season.

Levi's

Denim Utility Shirt

A denim button-down + swimsuit + loose linen shorts = my go-to beach look.

Levi's

Floral Rodeo Scarf

I can't stop tying scarfs around my shoulder bags for added interest.

Everyone needs a good pair of white jeans.

I'm convinced these are the most lightweight sneakers on the market, which is ideal for summer travel.

The North Face

Daybreak Rain Jacket

The sporty jacket trend isn't slowing down anytime soon.

Leset

Kyoto Carpenter Pant

My go-to pant for summer travel.

Medium Natural 5 Pocket Open Top Canvas Tote Bag

The North Face

Outdoor workout season is loading, and so is my new activewear collection.

Lululemon

Groove High-Rise Notched-Hem Crop

I'd wear these with a baggy tee and pair of flip-flops.

This new gray colorway is calling my name.
